Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. SDK configuration and related code: ...
2. Go to '...'
3. Click on '....'
4. Scroll down to '....'
5. See an error

A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

- Crowdin Flutter SDK: [e.g. 0.2.0]
